definition: adult male bird, to set the trigger of a firearm back for firing
details:
noun
- adult male bird
- adult male chicken
= synonyms: rooster
- the part of a gunlock that strikes the percussion cap when the trigger is pulled
= synonyms: hammer
- faucet consisting of a rotating device for regulating flow of a liquid
= synonyms: stopcock, turncock
- obscene terms for penis
= synonyms: tool
verb
- to set the trigger of a firearm back for firing
- to tilt or slant to one side
= example: to tilt or slant to one side
- to walk with a lofty proud gait, often in an attempt to impress others
= example: to walk with a lofty proud gait, often in an attempt to impress others
= synonyms: strut
